rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The person was not tested for influenza, as health officials didn’t learn about the symptoms until after the person recovered, meaning it was too late. For those keeping track: This [situation of delayed testing/reporting] is the second time that possible cases associated with the confirmed case have come to light well after the fact.
